channel.title: Ben and Greg Do Pod
channel.description: Ben and Greg are two drinking buddies who had an alcoholic dream of starting a podcast, while in our hometown bar. That dream is now a reality. In our journey we will be sharing our crazy stories, life experiences, and our one of a kind conversations that will have you laughing along with us. In the podcast we will be bringing you 5 stars of the week rating things 1 being "meh, that's okay" to 5 being " Super Majestic" and many other funny segments. Hopefully listening to our podcast will get you through your crappy day or week or give you something to laugh about for a while.
channel.author: Greg Nordstrom
channel.itunes:author: Greg Nordstrom

item.title: Ben and Greg Episode 5
item.description: After a high school break up Ben and Greg cut ties, but just like a high school break up they got back together 2 weeks later. In this episode they discussed last 2 weekends, the break up, some very weird things , and Celebrity Throwdown
item.dc:creator: Greg Nordstrom

item.title: Ben And Greg Do Pod Episode 2
item.description: We are back with episode 2, On this Episode we talk about Greg's terrible haircut, we rate butts, and the celebrity throw down tournament begins!
item.dc:creator: Greg Nordstrom
item.itunes:summary: We are back with episode 2, On this Episode we talk about Greg's terrible haircut, we rate butts, and the celebrity throw down tournament begins!

item.title: Ben and Greg Do Pod Episode 1
item.description: First podcast for us, talking about this recent weekend, current events, talking about things that matter (not really), 5 Stars, Celeberity Throw Down, Fight my cousin, and quote of the week. Some Cringeful moments but only going up from here
item.dc:creator: Greg Nordstrom
